article.title: Asa
article.paragraph: Aboutthe word and the name "Asa"the initialism or acronymASA (disambiguation){{!}}'''''ASA'''''wiktionaryAsaasaAsamay refer to:

list.listitem: Asa (name), a given name (including a list of persons with the name)

Asa language, of the Asa people

sa, genitive ofsir, the predominant group among the Norse gods
